# Assignments for Unit 1 {#sec-assignment1}

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This includes the list of assignments for Unit 1
:::

```{r}
#| label: tbl-unit1assignments
#| tbl-cap: Assignments from Unit 1
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(kableExtra)


assignment <- c('Install R', 'Install RStudio', 'Visual Salience Reading',
          'R Graphics Cookbook - Preface and 1.1 through 1.5 in R Basics')
date <- c('Aug 31, 2022', 'Aug 31, 2022', 'Sept 2, 2022', 'Sept 2, 2022')
source <- c('http://radicalresearch.llc/EDVcourse/tools.html',  'http://radicalresearch.llc/EDVcourse/tools.html',          'http://www.scholarpedia.org/article/Visual_salience', 'https://r-graphics.org/')

unit1 <- data.frame(assignment, date, source) 

kableExtra::kable(unit1, 'html') %>% 
  kable_material(c('striped', 'hover')) %>% 
  column_spec(1, bold = TRUE) %>% 
  column_spec(3, link = 'html')

```
